minecraft:written_book_content.title: Heart of the Sea
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Minecraft
pages: {"text":"You search the barrel, looking for the treasures within. There was a decent haul, but no great treasure that would seemingly justify all the effort made to hide this treasure. Instead, you find a strange book, with instructions on the creation of some mysterious, "}

{"text":"foreign machine. What instructions could be considered so valuable?

The blueprint is clear to follow, seemingly made of something similar to that of the underwater monuments. Three 3 dimensional rings, spanning 5 blocks each, all positioned at"}

{"text":"a right angle to each other, so as to form 8 equal squares in the spaces left.

In the middle, a mysterious conduit, floating in place, supposedly powering this contraption."}

{"text":"That is what was hidden. A conduit. Or at least part of one.

Here, in its place, are simply instructions."}
